item.title: We are on Zillow
item.description: We are now on Zillow with up-to-date listings. Please refer to Zillow for our current prices!

item.title: Phase 1 completed
item.description: Phase 1 of the project has been completed, and most lots have been sold. We are currently pre-selling lots for phase 2 of the project. Please contact us at by visiting our Contact page for more info!
